trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for a Web Parts zone.

In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.

The properties of the ToolZoneDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains all the items in a smart tag panel.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property indicates whether the zone is displayed when the user is in browse mode.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the action list collection for the zone designer.
The ActionLists property contains a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> collection that represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class contains zero or more <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class.
Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the Web Parts zone.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Web Parts zone is displayed when the user is in the browse display mode.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Web Parts zone is displayed when the user is in the browse display mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
